about.title: About Me
about.intro: As a backend specialist, I have contributed to numerous diverse projects in both professional and entrepreneurial environments. Passionate about innovation, I support you in your digital transformation, whether it’s to create, evolve, or maintain your solutions.
about.approach: With a results-oriented mindset and a collaborative approach, I tackle technical and human challenges to turn your ideas into tangible successes.
about.expertise: Because of my diverse experiences, I can contribute at every stage of the software development lifecycle:

skills.workshops: Facilitating workshops to clarify needs and align stakeholders.
skills.ux: Designing and optimizing user journeys for a smooth and intuitive experience.
skills.stories: Writing precise user stories to enable short and efficient development cycles.
skills.development: Developing reliable and maintainable solutions tailored to your needs.
skills.deployment: Efficient deployment in modern cloud environments.
skills.code_review: Code analysis to reduce technical debt and improve performance.
skills.testing: Implementing automated tests to ensure product quality and stability.
skills.coaching: Technical coaching for teams to instill best practices and a craftsmanship culture.

quality_guarantee.title: Quality Guarantee
quality_guarantee.description: As a signatory of the Software Craftsmanship Manifesto, my developments adhere to high-quality standards. In case of malfunctions, free and immediate corrections are guaranteed.
